Report Typos and Errors

PEPErrorType

The error type used to assess accuracy of computed solutions

Synopsis

typedef enum { PEP_ERROR_ABSOLUTE,
               PEP_ERROR_RELATIVE,
               PEP_ERROR_BACKWARD } PEPErrorType;

See Also

PEPComputeError()
